column6:
"Caged Angels" continues as we delve into the psyche of the Thunderbolts' most elusive member, Penance, the man formerly known as Speedball. While Thunderbolts Mountain remains in a perpetual state of discord, the greater chaos might be within Robbie Baldwin's own mind!,2007,10
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Rainier Beredo | penciller:Mike Deodato | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | writer:Warren Ellis | letterer:Richard Starkings
